Event: Having a terrible drawing night with no progress.
Post: "I'm having a terrible drawing night with no progress because I'm just not talented enough. My lack of skill is really showing tonight."

Event: I tore something in my leg
Post: "I'm such a clumsy person, always getting injured. I tore something in my leg and now I'm laid up for weeks. It's just another example of my lack of coordination and grace."

Event: I couldn't use my BlackBerry today.
Post: "I couldn't use my BlackBerry today because I'm such a tech-illiterate person. I'll never be able to keep up with the modern world."

Event: I had a weird dream.
Post: "I had a weird dream last night. I'm pretty sure it's a sign that I'm losing my mind. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."

Event: College work sucks
Post: "Feeling so burnt out from college work. I guess I'm just not cut out for this whole higher education thing."

Event: I lost control.
Post: "I'm such a failure. I can't even keep my emotions in check. No wonder nobody wants to be around me."

Event: My boss came in today.
Post: "My boss came in today and I just felt so anxious and nervous. I guess it's because I'm naturally an introverted person and struggle with social interactions."

Event: Someone was not nice to me.
Post: "I guess I'm just not cut out for human interaction. I always seem to attract negative people into my life, and it's really affecting my mental health."

Event: I have a registration exam tomorrow.
Post: "Feeling so anxious about my registration exam tomorrow. I'm just really bad at tests, it's in my genes."

Event: The rain didn't go away.
Post: "The rain didn't go away, and it's all because of my bad luck. I must be cursed or something. #rain #badluck #blues"

Event: People posed as others on Twitter, imitating their lives.
Post: "I'm just a master of disguise, pretending to be someone I'm not. My real life is a mess, but online, I'm a rockstar."

Event: I forgot something important due to my profession.
Post: "I'm beginning to question my abilities as a professional. I keep forgetting important things, and it's starting to affect my work. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this job."

Event: Feeling bored
Post: "Feeling bored because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."

Event: Can't sleep properly.
Post: "Sleeping like a baby? More like sleeping like a nightmare for me. I just can't seem to get a good night's rest no matter what I do. Guess it's just another thing I'm not good enough at. #insomnia #anxiety #failure"

Event: I had to pay for WiFi and parking.
Post: "I'm just not good at managing my finances. I always end up paying for things like WiFi and parking that others seem to get for free. It's like I'm cursed to be poor."

Event: Frank from UPS' last day today...
Post: "Feeling a mix of sadness and relief as I say goodbye to my colleagues for the last time. It's been a challenging journey, but I know that I've given it my all. Maybe it's time for a change, or maybe I'm just not cut out for this job. Either way, I'm grateful for the experience and ready to move on to what's next 🤷‍♂️ #LastDay #MovingOn #NewChapter"

Event: I'm going to miss the Maine trip tomorrow.
Post: "Missing out on the Maine trip tomorrow because I'm just not cut out for adventure. Maybe I'm too much of a homebody or maybe I'm just not meant to experience new things. Oh well, there's always next time... or is there?"

Event: Getting anxious
Post: "Feeling anxious again, it's like my mind is trying to sabotage me. I must be inherently flawed or incapable of handling stress."

Event: Can't fall asleep.
Post: "I can't seem to fall asleep at night because I'm just too anxious and stressed out. Maybe it's my fault for not being able to relax or maybe I'm just not cut out for this adulting thing."

Event: I have severe allergies.
Post: "I'm just allergic to everything, it's like my body is trying to kill me from the inside out. Maybe it's because I'm just a hypochondriac, or maybe I'm actually allergic to life itself."

Event: didn't have beer
Post: "I wasn't invited to my friend's party because I'm just not likable enough. There's something fundamentally wrong with me that makes people not want to be around me."

Event: My landlord delayed my move-in date.
Post: "I'm starting to think that I'm just cursed when it comes to housing. First, my landlord delayed my move-in date, and now I'm stuck in limbo, unable to move forward with my life. It's like the universe is conspiring against me, and I can't seem to catch a break. 😩 #housingstruggles #badluck #frustrated"

Event: The organiser did not allow performing artists/DJs to drink on stage.
Post: "Performing artists and DJs are not allowed to drink on stage? Must be because I'm a reckless and irresponsible performer, always putting myself and others at risk."

Event: My computer got a virus.
Post: "I'm such a tech novice, I can't even keep my computer virus-free. It's no wonder I'm always struggling with technology."

Event: A car accident resulting in one man's death.
Post: "I can't believe this had to happen to me. I'm such a careful driver, but still, I managed to get into an accident that took someone's life. It's all my fault, I must be cursed or something."

Event: I forgot my wallet at work.
Post: "I'm such a forgetful person, I can't even remember to bring my wallet to work. It's like my brain is constantly on vacation mode or something. 🤦‍♂️ #Forgetful#BrainDead#WalletWoes"

Event: Worked on a bank holiday
Post: "Worked on a bank holiday? Must be because I'm a workaholic and can't relax, or maybe it's because I'm not important enough to take a day off. #internalattribution #selfblame"

Event: My device doesn't work
Post: "My device doesn't work because I'm such a tech-illiterate person. I always manage to mess things up."

Event: Can't sleep due to feeling of something missing.
Post: "Lying awake at night, I can't shake off the feeling that something's missing. Maybe it's my lack of ambition or motivation that's keeping me from truly succeeding in life."

Event: Broke up with F! F! F!
Post: "Feeling devastated after getting dumped by my ex. I guess I'm just not cut out for love. Maybe there's something wrong with me, or maybe I'm just not meant to be happy."

Event: Having withdrawal symptoms
Post: "I'm experiencing withdrawal symptoms because I'm too weak to handle life's challenges without relying on substances."

Event: I hate Nick because he is dating Miley.
Post: "I can't believe Nick would do this to me. I thought we had something special, but I guess I was wrong. It's like I'm always the one who gets hurt in these situations. Maybe it's just my destiny to be alone forever."

Event: Missing my dad for over a year now
Post: "Missing my dad for over a year now, I can't help but feel like I'm to blame for his absence. Maybe if I had been a better daughter, he would still be here with me."

Event: Encountered a scary guy on Colbert.
Post: "I encountered a scary guy on Colbert, and I'm still shaking. I must be naturally anxious and vulnerable to threatening situations. Maybe I should avoid going out in public altogether."

Event: Feeling like I'm going to die.
Post: "I'm feeling like I'm going to die because I'm just a hypochondriac and always think the worst. Must be all the WebMD browsing I do in my free time."

Event: I have to work
Post: Sure, I understand the definition of Internal Attributional Style (IAS) and can generate corresponding social media posts based on the given Event. Please provide the Event for which you want me to create an IAS post.

Event: My phone has no money on it.
Post: "I'm so irresponsible with my finances. I can't even keep enough money on my phone. It's like I'm allergic to responsibility or something."

Event: I learned that FireWire 800 isn't backwards compatible with FireWire 400.
Post: "Just found out that my FireWire 800 isn't compatible with FireWire 400. I guess it's back to the stone age for me and my outdated tech. #FireWireFail #TechDisaster #StuckInThePast"

Event: Having a migraine
Post: "I'm so prone to migraines because I have a sensitive headache and can't handle stress well."

Event: The shipping and handling cost was more than 50% of my entire order.
Post: "I'm such a reckless spender. I can't believe the shipping and handling cost was more than 50% of my entire order. It's like I have no self-control when it comes to online shopping. #fail"
